00023 #ifndef TOKSTREAM_H_
00024 #define TOKSTREAM_H_
00025 
00026 
00027 /* Token stream data structure */
00028 typedef struct tokstream tokstream;
00029 
00030 
00031 /* Open a new tokstream from file */
00032 tokstream* ts_open(const char* file);
00033 
00034 /* Close a tokstream */
00035 void ts_close(tokstream* ts);
00036 
00037 
00038 /* Push the current tokstream state onto stack */
00039 int ts_push(tokstream* ts);
00040 
00041 /* Pop the current state from the stack */
00042 int ts_pop(tokstream* ts);
00043 
00044 
00045 /* Check if a tokstream is at EOF */
00046 int ts_eof(const tokstream* ts);
00047 
00048 /* Get file error flag of a tokstream */
00049 int ts_error(const tokstream* ts);
00050 
00051 /* Return current line number */
00052 int ts_line(const tokstream* ts);
00053 
00054 /* Return current character position */
00055 int ts_char(const tokstream* ts);
00056 
00057 /* Return the current token */
00058 const char* ts_tok(const tokstream* ts);
00059 
00060 
00061 /* Get the next token from stream */
00062 const char* ts_get(tokstream* ts);
00063 
00064 /* Unget current token */
00065 int ts_unget(tokstream* ts);
00066 
00067 /* Get rest of line from stream */
00068 const char* ts_getline(tokstream* ts);
00069 
00070 
00071 /* Skip over the next token */
00072 int ts_skip(tokstream* ts);
00073 
00074 /* Skip line in stream */
00075 int ts_skipline(tokstream* ts);
00076 
00077 
00078 /* Seek to token */
00079 int ts_seek(tokstream* ts, const char* tok);
00080 
00081 /* Seek to character */
00082 const char* ts_seekc(tokstream* ts, char c);
00083 
00084 /* Seek to any character from array */
00085 const char* ts_seekca(tokstream* ts, const char* ca);
00086 
00087 
00088 /* Set separator characters */
00089 void ts_sep(tokstream* ts, const char* sep);
00090 
00091 /* Set character as separator */
00092 void ts_sep_on(tokstream* ts, char c);
00093 
00094 /* Unset character as separator */
00095 void ts_sep_off(tokstream* ts, char c);
00096 
00097 /* Set delimiter characters */
00098 void ts_delim(tokstream* ts, const char* delim);
00099 
00100 /* Set character as delimiter */
00101 void ts_delim_on(tokstream* ts, char c);
00102 
00103 /* Unset character as delimiter */
00104 void ts_delim_off(tokstream* ts, char c);
00105 
00106 
00107 /* Set input buffer size for stream */
00108 int ts_bufsiz(tokstream* ts, int size);
00109 
00110 #endif
